title: How to Make a Mock Spinach Souffle

steps.headline: Spray a 1 1/2-quart souffle dish with nonstick cooking spray.
Remove excess moisture from spinach by draining the spinach in a sieve.
steps.description: Use the back of the spoon to press out the excess moisture. You can also place the spinach inside a clean dish towel and squeeze tightly to remove the moisture.

steps.headline: Add all the ingredients to a food processor except 1 tablespoon of the Parmesan cheese.
Sprinkle 1 tablespoon Parmesan cheese over the bottom of the prepared souffle dish.
Process the ingredients using the food processor.
steps.description: The mixture should be well blended.

steps.headline: Pour the egg mixture into the prepared souffle dish.
Bake souffle 50 minutes or until puffed and golden.

text: Preheat oven to 375 °F (191 °C).  Spray a 1 1/2-quart souffle dish with nonstick cooking spray.  Remove excess moisture from spinach by draining the spinach in a sieve. Use the back of the spoon to press out the excess moisture. You can also place the spinach inside a clean dish towel and squeeze tightly to remove the moisture. Add all the ingredients to a food processor except 1 tablespoon of the Parmesan cheese.  Sprinkle 1 tablespoon Parmesan cheese over the bottom of the prepared souffle dish.  Process the ingredients using the food processor. The mixture should be well blended. Pour the egg mixture into the prepared souffle dish.  Bake souffle 50 minutes or until puffed and golden.  Finished.
